# Repair Moderate Damage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Construct touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 173

*Your touch eliminates the wear and tear from the constructâ€™s body.*

This spell functions like *[[Repair Light Damage (Spell)|repair light damage]],* except that you repair 2d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +10) to a construct.
